Detailed Description

A class to use the sony pan tilt zoom unit.

Examples:

sonyPTZDemo.cpp.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
MAX_PAN 

maximum degrees the unit can pan (either direction)

maximum degrees the unit can tilt (either direction)
